name: Arcane Communication
description:
You can deliver silent messages. You gain touch telepathy, allowing you to communicate silently and mentally with any creature you're touching, as long as you share a language.

Enhancement You can send your messages even further. Your telepathy gains a range of 10 feet, but you still have to share a language with your target.Traits

Automaton: Automatons are living constructs sustained by a magical core.
